REST API repository Contacts¶

async src.repository.contacts.create(body: ContactModel, user: User, db: Session)¶

Create a new contact

Parameters:

  • body (ContactModel) – all parameters for new contact

  • user (User) – current user - contact owner

  • db (Session) – current session to db

Returns:

Contact | None

Return type:

Contact | None

async src.repository.contacts.delete(contact_id, user: User, db: Session)¶

Parameters:

  • user (User) – current user - contact owner

  • db (Session) – current session to db

Contact | None

async src.repository.contacts.find_birthday7day(user: User, db: Session)¶

Parameters:

  • user (User) – current user - contact owner

  • db (Session) – current session to db

Returns:

contact with birthday next 7 days

Return type:

List

async src.repository.contacts.get_all(skip: int, limit: int, user: User, db: Session)¶

get part of contact from current user

Parameters:

  • skip (int) – number of contacts to skip

  • limit (int) – number of contacts to return

  • user (User) – current user - contact owner

  • db (Session) – current session to db

Returns:

part of contact from current user

Return type:

List

REST API repository Users¶

async src.repository.users.confirmed_email(email: str, db: Session) → None¶

Set confirmed field for user in db

Parameters:

  • email (str) – user’s email in db

  • db (Session) – current session to db

Returns:

None if user is not confirmed

Return type:

None
